original_text:
He oppresses the poor and needy.
He commits robbery.
He does not return what he took in pledge.
He looks to the idols.
He does detestable things.
korean_text: 가난하고 궁핍한 자를 학대하거나 강탈하거나 빚진 자의 저당물을 돌려 주지 아니하거나 우상에게 눈을 들거나 가증한 일을 행하거나

sentences.original_text: He oppresses the poor and needy
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 가난한 자와 궁핍한 자를 억압하며

sentences.original_text: He does not return what he took in pledge
